home.caption: NextLevel Food for NextLevel Foodies
home.sub-caption: Taste & Share food from all over the world
home.how-it-works-para-1: NextLevel Food is a platform for foodies to share their favorite recipes with the world. It's a place to discover new dishes, and to connect with other food lovers.
home.how-it-works-para-2: NextLevel Food is a place to discover new dishes, and to connect with other food lovers.
